animeDescription: Paul is a young boy whose friend Nina is kidnapped by Belt Satan, the demonic ruler of another world. He daringly goes on a mission to rescue his friend. Pakkun, a plush doll with magic powers, aids him as they plunge into Belt Satan's dimension of living toys. Paul's journey is beset by many difficulties, but he also encounters a variety of delightful wonders.  (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Shirakawa, Sumiko', 'Yokozawa, Keiko', 'Oohira, Tooru', 'Ichiryuusai, Harumi', 'Tanonaka, Isamu', 'Terashima, Mikio', 'Konoshima, Aiko']
